description.zh: Etherpad 是一个面向网页的实时协作编辑器，支持多人同时在线编辑文档。具备完整的数据导出功能，可部署在用户自己的服务器上，让用户完全掌控数据和部署环境。
description.en: Etherpad is a real-time collaborative editor designed for web-based document collaboration. It allows thousands of users to edit documents simultaneously, offering full data export capabilities. The application runs on a self-hosted server, giving users full control over their data and deployment environment.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 可扩展支持数千名用户同时在线协作
- 自托管的解决方案，确保数据与部署环境的完全控制权
- 基于插件架构的高度可定制性
- 支持超过100种语言，国际化程度高

## 功能列表:

- 实时多人协同文档编辑
- 完整的数据导出能力
- 支持通过 Docker 和 Docker Compose 部署
- 插件系统用于扩展功能
- 通过插件支持用户认证和访客账户
- 提供 HTTP API 以便与其他应用集成
- 支持通过皮肤变体自定义界面样式
- 支持多种数据库，包括 PostgreSQL 和 MySQL
- 提供高本地化覆盖率的多语言支持
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Scalable to support thousands of simultaneous users
- Self-hosted solution for full data and deployment control
- Highly customizable through a plugin framework
- Available in over 100 languages with strong internationalization support

## Features:

- Real-time collaborative document editing
- Full data export capabilities
- Support for Docker and Docker Compose deployment
- Plugin system for extending functionality
- User authentication and guest account support via plugins
- HTTP API for integration with other applications
- Customizable UI with skin variants
- Support for multiple databases including PostgreSQL and MySQL
- Translation support with high localization coverage
